entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Victoria Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 p.m. PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 7:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: W 17 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except west 40 gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait early this evening. Wind becoming light early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
